value.name: Gunman pursued injured officer seeking cover, fired again
value.description: Burgon Sealy Jr., 26, was killed by law enforcement about 20 hours after he fatally shot the trooper, said the state police superintendent, Col. Nathaniel McQueen. Sealy fled in a car and holed up ...

value.name: Deadly force justified against suspect in trooper death
value.description: (AP) — Police were justified in using deadly force ... In a report dated Tuesday, authorities said Burgon Sealy Jr., 26, immediately began firing at officers who converged on his family's ...

value.name: Delaware House votes to reinstate death penalty
